title: Creating Connections that Count - Take 2
description: An online workshop focused on creating intentional, strategic plans for building relationships and community. It teaches how to transform key contacts into loyal champions, a core skill for any event professional.
primaryBenefit: An online workshop focused on creating intentional, strategic plans for building relationships and community. It teaches how to transform key contacts into loyal champions, a core skill for any event professional.

title: Maximize Your Brand Impact Through Event Marketing
description: An intensive course from the Philippine MICE Academy on leveraging events to build brand equity. A must-attend for event marketers aiming to create memorable brand experiences.
primaryBenefit: An intensive course from the Philippine MICE Academy on leveraging events to build brand equity. A must-attend for event marketers aiming to create memorable brand experiences.

title: National C.E.P.S. Certified Event Planning Specialist Masterclass Summit
description: A certification masterclass for event planning specialists. A prime opportunity to gain credentials, learn from experts, and network directly with peers.
location: Tektite Tower West, Ortigas Center, Pasig
primaryBenefit: A certification masterclass for event planning specialists. A prime opportunity to gain credentials, learn from experts, and network directly with peers.

title: Echelon Philippines 2025
description: A major tech business conference uniting startup leaders, visionary entrepreneurs, and forward-thinking investors from the Philippines and Southeast Asia. Aims to support and empower the tech market through regional partnerships, funding opportunities, and knowledge sharing.
primaryBenefit: A major tech business conference uniting startup leaders, visionary entrepreneurs, and forward-thinking investors from the Philippines and Southeast Asia. Aims to support and empower the tech market through regional partnerships, funding opportunities, and knowledge sharing.

title: PhNOG 2025+ Week (Philippine Network Operators Group)
description: A highly technical event for network engineers, architects, and operators to discuss core internet infrastructure, peering, and security. While technical, it offers networking for those building the backbone of tech startups.
location: Sheraton Manila Hotel, Newport World Resorts, Manila
primaryBenefit: A highly technical event for network engineers, architects, and operators to discuss core internet infrastructure, peering, and security. While technical, it offers networking for those building the backbone of tech startups.

title: The MarTech Summit Manila 2025
description: A premier conference for senior marketing professionals to discuss data-driven marketing, AI, customer engagement, and MarTech optimization. Features keynotes and panels from leaders at top companies.
primaryBenefit: A premier conference for senior marketing professionals to discuss data-driven marketing, AI, customer engagement, and MarTech optimization. Features keynotes and panels from leaders at top companies.

title: Cybersphere Philippines 2025
description: An international conference on cybersecurity, ICT, and cloud solutions. It serves as a major platform for vendors and experts to connect with decision-makers and stakeholders in the Philippines, focusing on national resilient networks, e-governance, and ICT infrastructure.
location: SMX Convention Center Aura, Taguig, Metro Manila
primaryBenefit: An international conference on cybersecurity, ICT, and cloud solutions. It serves as a major platform for vendors and experts to connect with decision-makers and stakeholders in the Philippines, focusing on national resilient networks, e-governance, and ICT infrastructure.

title: PhilSec 2025
description: The premier cybersecurity summit in the Philippines, gathering top experts to discuss the future of cybersecurity, cloud security, zero trust architecture, and digital forensics. Features high-level speakers from government and major corporations.

priceAmount: Delegate passes required (pricing to be announced)
specialFeatures: Atty. Jose Sutton Belarmino II (Deputy Privacy Commissioner
primaryBenefit: The premier cybersecurity summit in the Philippines, gathering top experts to discuss the future of cybersecurity, cloud security, zero trust architecture, and digital forensics. Features high-level speakers from government and major corporations.

title: Startup Funding in the Philippines & SEA: The Journey from Grants to IPO
description: A free online event by the Founder Institute covering the entire funding lifecycle for startups, from securing initial grants to navigating an Initial Public Offering (IPO). Ideal for founders planning their long-term funding strategy.
primaryBenefit: A free online event by the Founder Institute covering the entire funding lifecycle for startups, from securing initial grants to navigating an Initial Public Offering (IPO). Ideal for founders planning their long-term funding strategy.

description: The flagship annual, founder-focused summit by the Sinigang Valley Association. Features a full day of panels, discussions, and networking for startup leaders, investors, and community builders to shape the future of Philippine innovation.

primaryBenefit: The flagship annual, founder-focused summit by the Sinigang Valley Association. Features a full day of panels, discussions, and networking for startup leaders, investors, and community builders to shape the future of Philippine innovation.

specialFeatures: a startup tech advisor and CTO.

title: ReactJS Philippines - Regular Meetups

title: Philippine Startup Week 2025 (PHSW25)
description: The largest and most anticipated annual 5-day conference for the Philippine startup ecosystem.
